entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:13 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 26. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:13 AM PDT Monday 1 May 2023
